AI_GENERATED_SUMMARY: The sales representative, Bruce, engaged with the prospect, David, to understand their need for multi-region support and challenges with siloed legacy systems. Bruce provided a brief Loom demo, which David found solid, indicating they were in an early evaluation phase and appreciated the no-pressure approach. However, David later informed Bruce that an internal stakeholder was no longer interested, leading to the conclusion that the deal would not proceed.

Next_Steps: Analyze feedback from the prospect to improve future pitches.
Consider reaching out to other stakeholders within FedEx.

Email_Draft.subject: Thank You for Your Time
Email_Draft.body:
Hi David,

Thank you for the discussions we've had regarding the CRM solutions. I understand that the timing isn't right at the moment, but I appreciate your transparency. If circumstances change or if you need any assistance in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Best,
Bruce

AI_GENERATED_FOLLOW_UP.Slack_Message: Hi David, just wanted to say thank you for our discussions. If there's anything you need in the future, feel free to reach out!
